summary.name: Cinemark Theatres
summary.description: Cinemark Theatres is headquartered in Plano, TX, and is one of the major leaders in the the motion picture exhibition industry. As of December 2020, Cinemark has 531 locations and 5,958 screens in the U.S. and Latin America.

overview.name: Corporate Office (Plano, TX.)
overview.description: This is the headquarters for Cinemark Theatres. Here is where the executive team for the company works. The team consits of 5 individuals: Mark Zoradi (Chief Executive Officer and Director), Sean Gamble (COO & CFO), Valmir Fernandes (President of Cinemark International, L.L.C.), Michael D. Cavalier (Executive Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary) and Nikki Sacks (nvestor Relations Contact, ICR Inc).

location.address: 3900 Dallas Pkwy # 500 Plano, TX 75093 United States

overview.name: Cinemark Hollywood USA Movies 15
overview.description: This Theater was opened in 1992, introducing their new theme of Hollywood. Inside was checkered floors and ceilings as well as bright lights/ signs to almost give the illusion of a video game interior. This concept of an arcade interior was a popular theme for the 90s.

location.address: 4040 S. Shiloh Road Movies 15, Garland, TX 75041

overview.name: Cinemark Tinseltown
overview.description: This theaters theme was inspired by Cinemarks previous idea of "Hollywood USA" as listed above. The theater opened December 12th 1997 and had new amenities such as stadium seating, digital presentation, and self service box offices.

location.address: 4140 North Freeway, Eagleridge Shopping Center, Pueblo, CO 81008

overview.name: Cinemark Botafogo
overview.description: This theater is located in a shopping mall. It shows first run Brazilian and American films at the Botafogo Praia Shopping Centre, south of downtown Rio. It is a digital and 3D movie theater with stadium seating as well as VIP rooms.

location.address: Praia de Botafogo, 400 - Arco 800 - Botafogo, Rio de Janeiro - RJ, 22250-040, Brazil

overview.name: Cinemark Ada
overview.description: This location replaced an old one, taking on a more modern look with a sleeker design. Amenities include self service ticketing stations, multiple screens, and stadium seats. The theater opened on December 20, 2013, in the North Hills Shopping Centre. Reviews from customers list it as having a variety of movies to choose from.
